languages.text: "Обычно кибермастифов лишают любых проявлений животной натуры, но Глейто — особый случай. Его подмодель берет за основу собачью верность, охотничьи и сторожевые инстинкты и возводит их в абсолют. Он не пес и не сервитор, а намного лучше: кибермастиф — живое оружие на службе закона".

"Generally, cyber-mastiffs have all aspects of their animal nature removed, but Glaito is a special case. His sub-model takes a dog's loyalty and instincts as a hunter and guard and renders them absolute. He is neither a dog nor a servitor — he is something much more: a cyber-mastiff, a living weapon in service of the law."
languages.original_text: "Обычно кибермастифов лишают любых проявлений животной натуры, но Глейто — особый случай. Его подмодель берет за основу собачью верность, охотничьи и сторожевые инстинкты и возводит их в абсолют. Он не пес и не сервитор, а намного лучше: кибермастиф — живое оружие на службе закона".

languages.text: 「通常、サイバーマスチフは動物としての本能をすべて取り除かれますが、グライトは特別なケースです。彼のサブモデルは、犬の忠誠心や狩猟・警護の本能を取り込み、それらを極限まで高めています。彼は犬でもなければサーヴィターでもないーそれ以上の存在です。法に仕える生ける武器、それがサイバーマスチフなのです」
languages.original_text: "Generally, cyber-mastiffs have all aspects of their animal nature removed, but Glaito is a special case. His sub-model takes a dog's loyalty and instincts as a hunter and guard and renders them absolute. He is neither a dog nor a servitor — he is something much more: a cyber-mastiff, a living weapon in service of the law."

traits.locale_text: 「通常、サイバーマスチフは動物としての本能をすべて取り除かれますが、グライトは特別なケースです。彼のサブモデルは、犬の忠誠心や狩猟・警護の本能を取り込み、それらを極限まで高めています。彼は犬でもなければサーヴィターでもないーそれ以上の存在です。法に仕える生ける武器、それがサイバーマスチフなのです」

languages.text: "Normalerweise werden bei Cyber-Mastiffs alle Aspekte ihrer tierischen Natur entfernt, aber Glaito ist ein Sonderfall. Sein Modell optimiert die Treue und Instinkte als Jäger und Wächter eines Hundes bis an die Grenze. Er ist weder Hund noch Servitor – er ist viel mehr: ein Cyber-Mastiff, eine lebende Waffe im Dienste des Gesetzes."
languages.original_text: "Generally, cyber-mastiffs have all aspects of their animal nature removed, but Glaito is a special case. His sub-model takes a dog's loyalty and instincts as a hunter and guard and renders them absolute. He is neither a dog nor a servitor — he is something much more: a cyber-mastiff, a living weapon in service of the law."

traits.locale_text: "Normalerweise werden bei Cyber-Mastiffs alle Aspekte ihrer tierischen Natur entfernt, aber Glaito ist ein Sonderfall. Sein Modell optimiert die Treue und Instinkte als Jäger und Wächter eines Hundes bis an die Grenze. Er ist weder Hund noch Servitor – er ist viel mehr: ein Cyber-Mastiff, eine lebende Waffe im Dienste des Gesetzes."

languages.text: « Généralement, on retire tous les aspects naturels des cyber-mastiffs, mais Glaito est un cas à part. Son sous-modèle tire parti de la loyauté et des instincts de pisteur propres aux limiers et leur donne l'absolue priorité. Il n'est ni chien ni servitor... Il est bien plus que cela : un cyber-mastiff, une arme vivante au service de la loi. »
languages.original_text: "Generally, cyber-mastiffs have all aspects of their animal nature removed, but Glaito is a special case. His sub-model takes a dog's loyalty and instincts as a hunter and guard and renders them absolute. He is neither a dog nor a servitor — he is something much more: a cyber-mastiff, a living weapon in service of the law."

traits.locale_text: « Généralement, on retire tous les aspects naturels des cyber-mastiffs, mais Glaito est un cas à part. Son sous-modèle tire parti de la loyauté et des instincts de pisteur propres aux limiers et leur donne l'absolue priorité. Il n'est ni chien ni servitor... Il est bien plus que cela : un cyber-mastiff, une arme vivante au service de la loi. »

languages.text: «Generalmente los cibermastines son despojados de todos los aspectos de su naturaleza animal, pero Glaito es un caso especial. Su modelo maximiza la lealtad y los instintos del perro como cazador y guardián. No es un perro ni tampoco un servidor; es mucho más que eso. Es un cibermastín, un arma viva al servicio de la ley».
languages.original_text: "Generally, cyber-mastiffs have all aspects of their animal nature removed, but Glaito is a special case. His sub-model takes a dog's loyalty and instincts as a hunter and guard and renders them absolute. He is neither a dog nor a servitor — he is something much more: a cyber-mastiff, a living weapon in service of the law."

traits.locale_text: «Generalmente los cibermastines son despojados de todos los aspectos de su naturaleza animal, pero Glaito es un caso especial. Su modelo maximiza la lealtad y los instintos del perro como cazador y guardián. No es un perro ni tampoco un servidor; es mucho más que eso. Es un cibermastín, un arma viva al servicio de la ley».

languages.text: “通常来说，生化獒犬所有的动物本性都会被抹除，但格雷托是个特例。这种子型号的生化獒犬依然保留着猎犬的本能与忠诚，将犬类的特性强化到了极致。它既不是狗，也不是机仆，而是活生生的生化獒犬。它是拥有生命的武器，为帝国律法而战。”
languages.original_text: "Generally, cyber-mastiffs have all aspects of their animal nature removed, but Glaito is a special case. His sub-model takes a dog's loyalty and instincts as a hunter and guard and renders them absolute. He is neither a dog nor a servitor — he is something much more: a cyber-mastiff, a living weapon in service of the law."

traits.locale_text: “通常来说，生化獒犬所有的动物本性都会被抹除，但格雷托是个特例。这种子型号的生化獒犬依然保留着猎犬的本能与忠诚，将犬类的特性强化到了极致。它既不是狗，也不是机仆，而是活生生的生化獒犬。它是拥有生命的武器，为帝国律法而战。”

languages.text: "Genelde siber mastiflerin hayvansal doğalarının tüm yönleri ortadan kaldırılır ama Glaito bir istisna. Alt model, bir köpeğin sadakati ile avcı ve koruyucu içgüdülerini alır ve bunları bünyesinde mutlak olarak barındırır. Kendisi ne bir köpek ne de bir hizmetördür. Bundan çok daha fazlasıdır. Bir siber mastif, kanuna hizmet eden canlı bir silahtır."
languages.original_text: "Generally, cyber-mastiffs have all aspects of their animal nature removed, but Glaito is a special case. His sub-model takes a dog's loyalty and instincts as a hunter and guard and renders them absolute. He is neither a dog nor a servitor — he is something much more: a cyber-mastiff, a living weapon in service of the law."
